c= [-3,-2]
A= [[1,1,],[2,1],[1,0]]
b= [80,100,40]
x0_bounds = (0, None)
x1_bounds = (0, None)
# import library
from scipy.optimize import linprog
#solve 
solution = linprog(c,A,b, bounds=(x0_bounds, x1_bounds), method ='simplex')
print(solution)
